name: T/TAF 255-2024 Evaluation Specification for Intelligent Connected Vehicle Agents
use_case: Industry association standard covering evaluation criteria for intelligent connected vehicle agents including safety, interaction, and compliance.
data_summary: Emphasizes test data collection for driving scenarios, human-machine interaction, and safety validation.
monitoring: Recommends continuous monitoring of deployed vehicle agents and periodic re-evaluation.
emergency_plan: Provides guidance on handling major safety incidents and issuing corrective measures.
obligations: Perform conformity testing across interaction, safety, and compliance dimensions.
Maintain documentation of datasets, tools, and test environments used.
Implement corrective measures when evaluation thresholds are not achieved.
